channel.title: Running 503 client/server
channel.description:
alright i run the client and i get this once i log on
[code]Error: T3 - true,0,104,1401869149,-48544502,-1125057849,-1186152368 | RSString:8 55 Class21:188 Class21:520 Class61:337 client:767 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1:15 6 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true[/code]
and when i start the server i get this..
[code]Starting server on port: 43594 maxListedNPCs size is to low. maxListedNPCs size is to low. [/code]
any help with this one???

item.title: Running 503 client/server
item.dc:creator: @xxGRIMxxREAPERxx xxGRIMxxREAPERxx
item.description:
@xxGRIMxxREAPERxx wrote:

i get that error too. I have a 508 server, it use to work, I use to use the login test because i was testing out the server and it worked… but after a while test didnt work. I changed my username, then i didnt get that error no more.

So im thinking… the game crashed after i teled to a place where there was no map. So idk… w/e username you are using, try using another one. [:

Read full topic

Press any key to continue . . .

and when i press Enter it closes i was wondering how to fix this problem and get it to run
